content:
- 2 -
of whom as well as Mission had been duly informed by CUSA allocation letter No. 1150 under date of March 5, 1962.
As for Non-Project excess properties, copies of Excess List compiled from the contents of all Purchase Orders were forwarded to relevant Government enterprises prior to their arrivals. Requests had been received from interested parties and arrived properties had been allocated to those parties or disposed of in accordance with the order of priority as stipulated in PA 0220.
A report on arrivals and dispositions of Non-Project excess properties has been compiled and submitted to you and a monthly report in the same nature will be forwarded for your reference and use beginning next month.
Sincerely yours,
K. T. Li Secretary General
cc: Mr. J. D. Martin, AID/C BES 2D 3D

paragraphs.content: of whom as well as Mission had been duly informed by CUSA allocation letter No. 1150 under date of March 5, 1962.

As for Non-Project excess properties, copies of Excess List compiled from the contents of all Purchase Orders were forwarded to relevant Government enterprises prior to their arrivals. Requests had been received from interested parties and arrived properties had been allocated to those parties or disposed of in accordance with the order of priority as stipulated in PA 0220.

A report on arrivals and dispositions of Non-Project excess properties has been compiled and submitted to you and a monthly report in the same nature will be forwarded for your reference and use beginning next month.
cc: Mr. J. D. Martin, AID/C BES 2D 3D
